featured.text: Some people might prefer a lot of 36 exercise to more challenging exercise.
Exciting or challenging events __(39)__ the birth of a child, completion of a major project at work, or moving to a new city generate __(40)__ much stress as does tragedy or disaster.

definition.en_def: difficult in a way that tests one's abilities
definition.example: The exam was very challenging, but I managed to pass.
